title: Morning Joe 4/7/21
description: In the final weeks of Mr. Trump’s term, Rep. Matt Gaetz, R-Fla., privately asked the WH for blanket pre-emptive pardons for himself and unidentified congressional allies for any crimes they may have committed, the NYT reports.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: In the final weeks of Mr. Trump’s term, Rep. Matt Gaetz, R-Fla., privately asked the WH for blanket pre-emptive pardons for himself and unidentified congressional allies for any crimes they may have committed, the NYT reports.
